name: IDENTITY_ID_HX
description: The IDENTITY_ID_HX table contains the system master person index ID History for your patients. Each patient may have multiple master person index IDs; therefore, a line number is used to identify each identification number for a patient.

columns.name: PAT_ID
columns.description: The unique ID assigned to the patient record. This ID may be encrypted if you have elected to use enterprise reporting�s encryption utility.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number of the patient ID within the patient�s record.

columns.name: ID_HX
columns.description: The old master person index ID for the patient record.

columns.name: ID_TYPE_HX
columns.description: The old master person index ID Type for the patient record.

columns.name: ID_TYPE_HX_ID_TYPE_NAME
columns.description: The name of the ID Type.

columns.name: IDENTITY_NEW_ID
columns.description: The ID that is now active for this ID Type.
